meanings.sent1: A profitable investment can bring in extra money.
meanings.sent2: The company's decision to expand was profitable in the long run.
meanings.sent3: It's always a profitable idea to save money for a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work proved to be a profitable endeavor.
meanings.sent5: The profitable outcome of the project exceeded everyone's expectations.

meanings.sent1: Selling homemade crafts can be a profitable side business.
meanings.sent2: Investing in stocks can be a profitable way to grow your wealth.
meanings.sent3: The profitable sale of the old car allowed him to buy a new one.
meanings.sent4: Her idea to start a small bakery turned out to be quite profitable.
meanings.sent5: The profitable venture brought in more revenue than anticipated.

meanings.sent1: It is always profitable to have a positive attitude in life.
meanings.sent2: Being kind to others is a profitable way to build strong relationships.
meanings.sent3: Finding a shortcut through the park proved to be a profitable discovery.
meanings.sent4: His decision to study hard was a profitable choice for his future.
meanings.sent5: The profitable outcome of the negotiation left both parties satisfied.
